attributes.action: Make Politics a compulsorary topic of the curriculum in citizenship lessons for children aged 12-18
attributes.additional_details: making politics a more taught, and better taught subject for 12-18 year olds, to raise political awareness. this should be taught in citizenship lessons in the UK curriculum as a compulsorary topic for a minimum of 1 half-term each year. this is to equip the next generation with the knowledge and awareness many new voters lack.
